body_html:
Real data and generator inputs are different kinds of things. The former goes to the discriminator, the latter goes to the generator. The analogy isn't between real data and generator inputs, but between real data and generator outputs, which are handled the same way.

body:
Real data and generator inputs are different kinds of things. The former
goes to the discriminator, the latter goes to the generator. The analogy
isn't between real data and generator inputs, but between real data and
generator outputs, which are handled the same way.
